definitions.definition: An increase or rise , especially to counteract a perceived discrepancy .
A deliberate or premeditated increase in the violence or geographic scope of a conflict .
The reassignment of a difficult problem to someone whose job is dedicated to handling such cases .

secondary_definitions: An increase or rise , especially to counteract a perceived discrepancy .
A deliberate or premeditated increase in the violence or geographic scope of a conflict .
( support ) The reassignment of a difficult problem to someone whose job is dedicated to handling such cases .
